title: Weather App
description: A simple and intuitive web application for checking weather information using the WeatherAPI.com API.

title: Sign-up Page
description: A user-friendly registration web page with input validation. It includes custom error messages and password confirmation validation.

title: Calculator
description: A simple and functional calculator implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Supports basic arithmetic operations and keyboard input.

title: Etch-a-Sketch
description: A web project that simulates a digital "Etch-a-Sketch." Explore your creativity and draw using different tools and options.

title: CV Generator
description: A web application that allows you to easily create and customize your curriculum vitae (CV).

title: Free Market
